vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Issachar living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Gen.46.13;
son of: Issachar (H3485);
brother of: Tola (H8439), Puah (H6312) and Shimron (H8110B); also called Yob (KJV: Job) at Gen.46.13;
Another name of ya.shuv (יָשׁוּב "Jashub" H3437H)
§ Job = "persecuted"
the 3rd son of Issachar also called 'Jashub'
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
約伯 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "受迫害的"
以薩迦的三子 {#創 46:13|}, 也叫"雅述" {#代上 7:1|}
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
约伯 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "受迫害的"
以萨迦的三子 {#创 46:13|}, 也叫"雅述" {#代上 7:1|}
